response.original_title: The Model T: A Year of Celebration 2008
response.overview: In 1908 a product was released to the population that, in time, changed the way all people lived and worked. That creation was the Ford Model T.  For 19 years in a row, the Model T ruled the roads. In 1927 assembly of the Model T came to an end, with more than 15 million having been produced and sold all over the world.  The phrase "most famous" is applied when speaking about this machine. 100 years after the Model T's birth, the vehicle received its centennial celebration.  This DVD captures the flavor of the 2008 celebration in honor of this famous vehicle. Re-live the spirit and enthusiasm which encompasses each event.
response.title: The Model T: A Year of Celebration 2008
